entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Matapedia

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 6 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
